channel.title: Summer '22 Week 6 :: CIS 527 Textbook
channel.description: YouTube Video Resources Slides Video Script Hello, and welcome to the week six Announcements video for CIS 527 in summer 2022. So this week, you should be wrapping up lab five, which is due today at 7pm. So make sure you get that done. Most of lab grading is really simple. And weâ€™ll talk about that in just a minute. You should also be wrapping up the week five discussion, which is also due tonight by midnight, so make sure you get that done.
